name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
description: Promotes sustainable agriculture practices to help farmers cope with climate change.

name: Mukhya Mantri Krishi Sa Sajuli Yojana
description: Financial assistance to small and marginal farmers.

name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: A scheme to increase the production of rice, wheat and pulses on a sustainable basis in the identified districts of the country.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: A state plan scheme to achieve 4% annual growth in agriculture sector.

name: Bringing Green Revolution to Eastern India (BGREI)
description: Aims to increase agricultural production in eastern India.
